testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Exception in test #1
Probably your program run out of input (Scanner tried to read more than expected).
java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.base/java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1651) at readability.Main.main(Main.java:17)
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: input.txt
> EASY
